Package org.sat4j.tools

Class DotSearchTracing<T>

java.lang.Object
org.sat4j.specs.SearchListenerAdapter<ISolverService>
org.sat4j.tools.DotSearchTracing<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, SearchListener<ISolverService>, UnitClauseConsumer, VarMapper
public class DotSearchTracing<T> extends SearchListenerAdapter<ISolverService> implements VarMapper
Class allowing to express the search as a tree in the dot language. The resulting file can be viewed in a tool like Graphviz To use only on small benchmarks. Note that also does not make sense to use such a listener on a distributed or remote solver.
Since:
2.2
Author:
daniel
See Also:
Serialized Form
